For anyone having video problems, I solved mine by turning off any forced video card settings (set ATI Catalyst settings to "let the application decide", not sure what the nVidia equivalent is). 

I had all settings forced to highest before, and the game would barely play at 1 FPS. Highest settings work well as long as they're set in the game options, not in the video card driver. 

Hope that helps.

AMD Phenom II x4 955 OC'd 3.7GHz
Radeon 5830
8GB RAM

Emm guys, I dunno if this work for you guys, but if the game crashes at certain point, like when you encounter pep soldiers, try playing it windowed mode. It works for me. Hope it helps!

and yeah, one more thing, if you started the game, and it shows a black blank screen. ok, wait for some minutes, maybe for 15-20 mins. It'll start later. and if it does not start for, maybe an hour, ok, now there is something wrong.

and one more thing, if you launched your game and it only shows a black blank screen, ok wait for about 15-20 minutes, trust me, it'll start after that. and it'll start normally from that on. And, if the game does not start if you wait, maybe almost for an hour, NOW you have issues.

if any of you guys have problems with controls--> enable vsync, turn all settings to low quality and run in 640X480 or 800X600 screen resolution. If any of these dont work disable Catalyst A.I under 3D settings for ATI usert. hope this helps :)
